alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 12 at 10:32PM AKDT until October 13 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, The Chilkat River and surrounding area. * WHEN...Until 700 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Possible isolated landslides in areas of steep terrain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1031 PM AKDT, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain across the advisory area. Minor flooding is expected to begin overnight, especially near the Chilkat River. Additional rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches are possible. - For Chilkat River at Klukwan: At 10:00pm the stage was 121.81 feet and slowly rising. Flood Stage is 128.0 feet. Forecast: A crest around 128.43 feet is expected around 4:00pm Thursday.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
